pages.text: The Straw Hat Pirates are a Crew Formed by Monkey D. 'Straw Hat' Luffy. His Crew Includes $(li)Roronoa Zoro $(li)'Cat Burglar' Nami $(li)'Go D.' Usopp $(li)'Black Leg' Sanji $(li)Tony Tony Chopper $(li)Nico Robin $(li)Franky $(li)'Soul King' $(li)Brook $(li)Jinbe

pages.title: Monkey D. Luffy
pages.text: Monkey D. Luffy can usually be seen wearing Shorts and a Vest or Long Sleeve Shirt as well as a Straw Hat. $(br)He is a Devil Fruit User who has the Hito Hito no Mi: Model Nika which gives him the Properties of Rubber, It is also a Mythical Zoan type Devil Fruit.

pages.title: Roronoa Zoro
pages.text: Roronoa Zoro can be seen wearing a set of 3 Swords on his Waist. $(br)He is a Sword Main who Fights with the 3 Swords on his Waist, He has fought with $(li)Wado Ichimonji $(li)Yubishiri $(li)Sandai Kitetsu $(li)Shisui $(li)Enma $(li)Brooms

pages.title: 'Cat Burglar' Nami
pages.text: 'Cat Burglar' Nami is a character with Bright Orange Hair and a Tattoo on her Left Arm. $(br) She Fights with a Clima-tact and uses Weather Balls to create Lighting Bases Abilities like the Goro Goro no Mi.
